Package etomica.modules.glass

Class DataSourceBlockAvgCor

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.modules.glass.DataSourceBlockAvgCor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceIndependent, IDataSink, IDataSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataSourceCorMSD

    public class DataSourceBlockAvgCor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataSink, IDataSource, DataSourceIndependent
    Measures correlation of blocks of increasing size.
